name: Ski Jumping PVP
description:
Features:

  • jumps inspired by real world objects
  • several gameplay modes (multiplayer mode, local multiplayer mode, bots mode)
  • advanced physics
  • replay system
  • statistics and hill records

Hills:

  • Wisła HS134
  • Zakopane HS140
  • Titisee-Neustadt HS142
  • Planica HS240
  • Lahti HS130
  • Lahti HS100
  • Vikersund HS240
  • Lillehammer HS140
  • Lillehammer HS98
* the list will be expanded with future updates
